mapper.update: update mkt_cam_evt_rel set MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EVENT_ID = #{eventId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where MKT_CAMP_EVT_REL_ID = #{mktCampEvtRelId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select MKT_CAMP_EVT_REL_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, EVENT_ID, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from mkt_cam_evt_rel where MKT_CAMP_EVT_REL_ID = #{mktCampEvtRelId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select MKT_CAMP_EVT_REL_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, EVENT_ID, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from mkt_cam_evt_rel
